pageContext.collection_description: Contains scripts for several series, including City Hospital, 1951-1958, Inner Sanctum, 1941-1952, Mystery in the Air, 1945, NBC Radio Theatre, Adventures of the Thin Man, Theatre Five, The Man From G-2, Adventure Theatre and other shows. Also includes a draft of a confidential report Newman wrote in 1943, probably for the government, and other documents regarding radio broadcasting.
